title: Access award-winning online courses from just £27!
content:
It’s never too late to learn something new. Whether you want to gain a qualification to help with a career change, start your own business or simply learn a new skill, the Centre of Excellence can you help you get there. Boasting a wide range of online courses, from vegan nutrition to organic gardening, this award-winning online learning platform makes achieving your goals simple. With this exclusive deal, our readers can choose between some of its fantastic courses, which usually cost between £97-£147, for just £27, or any other course on the Centre of Excellence website for £29. Simply use code LEARNED at checkout to access this great offer.

Get offer now!

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

What courses can I choose from?

  • Vegan Nutritionist Diploma Course
  • Digital Photography Diploma Course
  • Master Herbalist Diploma Course
  • Organic Skincare Business Diploma Course
  • Urban Food Gardening Diploma Course
  • Novel Writing Diploma Course
  • Organic Gardening Diploma Course
  • Canine Behaviour Training Diploma Course
  • Greek Mythology Diploma Course
  • Genealogy Diploma Course

What will my course include?

  • A course syllabus of 10-25 modules (dependant on course)
  • Videos and presentations (dependant on course)
  • Lifetime access
  • Study group access
  • Multiple-choice assessments
  • A course accredited and certified by authorised certification partners

Ready to start learning? Don’t forget to use code LEARNED at checkout to get your exclusive discount!

Get offer now!

Offer ends 24/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
